text:
Hi All,

I'm looking to pass a long term client off to a hubl developer that can understand and compliment the development of a pretty large website that I built. They have a stack of dev work ready to go and I don't have the bandwidth at the moment. If you take care of them they are a great long term client. Anyone who is interested can pm me.

On a module. How can I check if a repeater field is empty?

{% if field %} does not work

{% if field.length > 0 %} does not work either

It seems repeaters donâ€™t follow the same rules as other iterable elements
is the repeater a group or an item <@URHTTS0MU>
